Updates.M: lambda c, r, rm: int(c and not(r or rm))
Updates.R: lambda a,  am: int(not(a or am))
Updates.Rm: lambda r, a, am: int(r or not(a or am))
Updates.A: lambda b, l: int(b and l)
Updates.Am: lambda l, lm: int(l or lm)
Updates.L: lambda p, le, ge: int((p and le) and not(ge))
Updates.Lm: lambda lem, p, le, ge: int(((lem and p) or le)and not(ge))
